docs.abstract: Key senators and corporate executives warned at a hearing on Tuesday that the “scope and scale” of the hacking of government agencies and companies, the most sophisticated in history, were still unclear.
docs.snippet: Key senators and corporate executives warned at a hearing on Tuesday that the “scope and scale” of the hacking of government agencies and companies, the most sophisticated in history, were still unclear.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — With President Biden’s aides struggling to find innovative ways to retaliate against Russia for the most sophisticated hacking of government and corporations in history, key senators and corporate executives warned on Tuesday that the “scope and scale” of the operation were unclear, and that the attack might still be continuing.

headline.main: After Russian Cyberattack, Looking for Answers and Debating Retaliation
headline.print_headline: Retracing Missteps and Searching for Answers After Russian Cyberattack

docs.abstract: In “How to Avoid a Climate Disaster,” the billionaire Microsoft founder lays out his concerns for the earth and some concrete ideas for the future.
docs.snippet: In “How to Avoid a Climate Disaster,” the billionaire Microsoft founder lays out his concerns for the earth and some concrete ideas for the future.
docs.lead_paragraph: HOW TO AVOID A CLIMATE DISASTERThe Solutions We Have and the Breakthroughs We NeedBy Bill Gates

headline.main: How Does Bill Gates Plan to Solve the Climate Crisis?

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: How to Avoid a Climate Disaster: The Solutions We Have and the Breakthroughs We Need (Book)

docs.abstract: Many big businesses have not set targets for reducing greenhouse gas emissions. Others have weak goals.
docs.snippet: Many big businesses have not set targets for reducing greenhouse gas emissions. Others have weak goals.
docs.lead_paragraph: For the past several years, BlackRock, the giant investment firm, has cast itself as a champion of the transition to clean energy.

headline.main: What’s Really Behind Corporate Promises on Climate Change?
headline.print_headline: The Climate Talk vs. the Walk

byline.original: By Peter Eavis and Clifford Krauss
